name: 1v1 Monster Combat Prototype
description:
1v1 Monster Combat Prototype

A prototype in progress. Tutorial available in Help/Settings

Shop Features:

Buy and sell monsters. Multiple Alternate colourations are rarer but more expensive. Can't afford them? reserve them for later.

Customisation - Change nicknames and techniques quickly and easily. Move info available on mouse over.

Save and load between battles (When relevant, enemy info is also saved).

Monster form progress can be viewed.

Once unlocked Monster forms can be changed/reverted.

Battle Features:

Elemental Type system, stamina management and Move types.

Move Types - Attack < Block/Dodge < Status < Attack. Predict your opponent's moves to gain the advantage.

No RNG - moves don't have a chance to miss or crit, additional effects are conditional and not based on chance.

Aggressive AI - Uses moves which deal the most damage whilst maintaining stamina. Will go for the kill if possible.

Battles on a timer - don't act quick enough and do Nothing that turn.

Battle Log and Icons make battles clearer.

Technique mastery - Using moves repeatedly and well increases technique exp which can result in learning new techniques or form changes.

Experience is gained at the end of each turn.

Monsters may change forms due to different requirements.

Planned features:

6v6 battles, Double battles, Abilities, Items, Weather, More Monsters

Let me know if you want to see more of this by providing feedback.
